statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_materials_certification_status;
SELECT id, material_name FROM packaging_materials_certification_status WHERE certification_status='Approved';
SELECT material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials_certification_status ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials_certification_status WHERE date_certified BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials_certification_status WHERE certification_status='Pending' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials_certification_status WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT material_name, date_certified FROM packaging_materials_certification_status WHERE certification_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certified FROM packaging_materials_certification_status WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT certification_status, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM packaging_materials_certification_status GROUP BY certification_status ORDER BY total_certifications DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials_certification_status WHERE date_certified BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date_certified ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM packaging_materials WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT material_id, COUNT(log_id) AS certification_count FROM certification_logs GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM packaging_materials WHERE certification_status = 'Approved'
SELECT material_id, material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY certification_status DESC
SELECT * FROM certification_logs ORDER BY certification_date ASC
SELECT certification_agency, COUNT(*) FROM certification_logs GROUP BY certification_agency HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_authority FROM certifications;
SELECT pm.material_name, c.certification_name FROM packaging_materials pm JOIN material_certifications mc ON pm.id = mc.material_id JOIN certifications c ON mc.certification_id = c.id;

SELECT pm.material_name, c.certification_name, mc.expiry_date FROM packaging_materials pm JOIN material_certifications mc ON pm.id = mc.material_id JOIN certifications c ON mc.certification_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT id, material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT * FROM material_certifications INNER JOIN certifications ON material_certifications.certification_id = certifications.id;

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, certifications.certification_name, material_certifications.expiry_date FROM packaging_materials, certifications, material_certifications WHERE packaging_materials.id = material_certifications.material_id AND certifications.id = material_certifications.certification_id;

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name AS material, certifications.certification_name AS certification, material_certifications.expiry_date AS expiry FROM packaging_materials JOIN material_certifications ON packaging_materials.id = material_certifications.material_id JOIN certifications ON material_certifications.certification_id = certifications.id ORDER BY material ASC, expiry DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT agency_name, location FROM certification_agencies ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT practice_name FROM sustainable_practices WHERE description LIKE '%eco-friendly%';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials
SELECT material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials WHERE certification_status = 'approved'

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, certification_agencies.agency_name, material_certifications.certification_date FROM packaging_materials JOIN material_certifications ON packaging_materials.material_id = material_certifications.material_id JOIN certification_agencies ON material_certifications.agency_id = certification_agencies.agency_id
SELECT material_name, certification_status FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%plastic%'
SELECT * FROM sustainable_practices
SELECT * FROM certification_status;
SELECT material_name, certification_date FROM certification_status WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_cost > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_cost DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM sustainability_metrics;
SELECT * FROM certification_status ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, certification_date, certification_status FROM certification_status WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, material_category, material_cost FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_cost > 50 ORDER BY material_cost DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT m.material_name, c.certification_date, s.metric_name FROM certification_status c INNER JOIN material_certifications mc ON c.certification_id = mc.certification_id INNER JOIN packaging_materials m ON mc.material_id = m.material_id INNER JOIN metric_records r ON m.material_id = r.material_id INNER JOIN sustainability_metrics s ON r.metric_id = s.metric_id WHERE c.certification_status = TRUE;
